channel.title: Old coder needing a little help
channel.description:
It's been awhile since i have been on these forums.. Wow.. Anyways, here is my problem..
I am running on Windows 7, and i am trying to get my server up and running again, now.. when i go to compile, it works completely fine, compiles and everything, but when i click run, to set the server online, with nothing else running, no other server, nothing, i get this:
[code] java.net.SocketException: Unrecognized Windows Sockets error: 0: JVM_Bind at java.net.PlainSocketImpl.socketBind(Native Method) at java.net.PlainSocketImpl.bind(PlainSocketImpl.java:365) at java.net.ServerSocket.bind(ServerSocket.java:319) at java.net.ServerSocket.<init>(ServerSocket.java:185) at java.net.ServerSocket.<init>(ServerSocket.java:141) at DavidScape.net.SocketListener.<init>(SocketListener.java:36) at DavidScape.Server.main(Server.java:49) Press any key to continue . . . [/code]
Any advice to what i can do? I have everything set, enviormental variables, i've changed everything to my new JDK, and all, i was working on this source back when my computer was windows vista, and i brought it over to my new computer running windows 7. Thanks for any help.
Classpath: CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_20\bin;%CLASSPATH%; Path: C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_20\bin;

item.title: Old coder needing a little help
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“Server Creator Brian, post:3, topic:339619”]Ah thank you David, i am working on your source btw I remember you.[/quote]I figured you were, as it says:

DavidScape.Server.main

lol

Read full topic

item.title: Old coder needing a little help
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

It has nothing to do with your environmental variables, or your JDK.

The problem is most likely you have something else running on that port (you might not even know about), try changing the port in Run.bat and see if you get the same problem.

Read full topic
item.source: Old coder needing a little help

item.title: Old coder needing a little help
item.dc:creator: @Server_Creator_Brian Server Creator Brian
item.description:
@Server_Creator_Brian wrote:

It’s been awhile since i have been on these forums… Wow… Anyways, here is my problem…

I am running on Windows 7, and i am trying to get my server up and running again, now… when i go to compile, it works completely fine, compiles and everything, but when i click run, to set the server online, with nothing else running, no other server, nothing, i get this:

java.net.SocketException: Unrecognized Windows Sockets error: 0: JVM_Bind
        at java.net.PlainSocketImpl.socketBind(Native Method)
        at java.net.PlainSocketImpl.bind(PlainSocketImpl.java:365)
        at java.net.ServerSocket.bind(ServerSocket.java:319)
        at java.net.ServerSocket.<init>(ServerSocket.java:185)
        at java.net.ServerSocket.<init>(ServerSocket.java:141)
        at DavidScape.net.SocketListener.<init>(SocketListener.java:36)
        at DavidScape.Server.main(Server.java:49)
Press any key to continue . . .

Any advice to what i can do? I have everything set, enviormental variables, i’ve changed everything to my new JDK, and all, i was working on this source back when my computer was windows vista, and i brought it over to my new computer running windows 7. Thanks for any help.

Classpath: CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_20\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
Path: C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_20\bin;

Read full topic
